name: Clonewars: Kanzi
description:
Mein Versuch an "Twelve Monkeys: Kanzi" 
Kiwi, Erdbeer & Wassermelone in harmonie, ein leckerer, fruchtiger Sommermix

- engl-
My Take on "Twelve Monkeys: Kanzi" 
Kiwi, Strawberry & Watermelone in a harmonical, fruity summermix
author: Professor_Eliquid

reviews.text: Never had the original so can't comment on how well it is cloned. I can, however, say that it tastes great. I left out the sweetener, because I don't like it, and added ws-23. Very nice and smooth.
